sentences.sContent: How to determine if a point lies on the diagonal of a square?
sentences.sContent_eng: How to determine if a point lies on the diagonal of a square?
sentences.sCn: 如何确定一个点在一个正方形的对角线？

sentences.sContent: In the next steps I will show you how to use this pattern to create a diagonal mosaic pattern.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the next steps I will show you how to use this pattern to create a diagonal mosaic pattern.
sentences.sCn: 在接下来的步骤中，我将向您展示如何使用这种图案创建一个对角线的马赛克图案。

sentences.sContent: The Junk De Luxe Faron Polo stands out with its offset diagonal cut of blue and pink horizontal stripes.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Junk De Luxe Faron Polo stands out with its offset diagonal cut of blue and pink horizontal stripes.
sentences.sCn: 豪华的垃圾法龙罗位居前列，其抵消了蓝色和粉红色的水平条纹对角线晋级。

synos.tran: 斜的；[数]对角线的；斜纹的

remMethod.val: dia(穿过) + gon(角) + al → 穿过两个角的线 → 对角线

words.tran: 斜向移动；循对角线方向移动
与…斜向地成一行；使对角线化
